question: Which country would chair the South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC) meeting, to be held on September 24, 2020?
explanation:
South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC) meeting is scheduled to be held on 24th September 2020. The meeting would be held in a virtual mode through video conference.
The meeting would be chaired by Pradeep Kumar Gyawali, Nepalâ€™s Minister for Foreign Affairs. The foreign ministers of all the member countries would take part in the meeting. Ministers of India and Pakistan are also scheduled to meet.
